      • advanceY

        public static void advanceY(Element el,
                            boolean pad,
                            boolean lineFeed)
        Advance the y position by the height of the specified element + (optionally) the default vertical padding OR the default line feed.
        Parameters:
        el - element to use for height
        pad - true → additionally advance by default vertical padding
        lineFeed - true → additionally advance by linefeed amount
